definition: an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
surname Leng
cold
an upset (esp. in sports)/unexpected turn of events/to pull off a coup/a breakthrough
erhua variant of 爆冷門|爆冷门[bao4 leng3 men2]

sentences.english: There are two Nobel surprises this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年有两个诺贝尔奖项爆冷。

sentences.english: Yesterday Slumdog Millionaire was the unexpected winner of the Best Picture Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 昨天《贫民窟的百万富翁》爆冷赢得奥斯卡最佳影片。

sentences.english: "Honey" won Golden Bear award in Berlin International Film Festival successfully.
sentences.chinese: 《蜂蜜》柏林电影节爆冷成功擒金熊奖。
意大利几无被爆冷的可能。
